title: The Civil War: Causes and Effects

vocab.definition: A war between people of the same country, fought in America from 1861-1865
The practice of owning people as property and forcing them to work
The northern states that stayed united during the Civil War
The southern states that separated from the Union
The 16th President who led the country during the Civil War

teachingNotes: Focus on the main cause (disagreement over slavery) and the outcome (slavery ended, country reunited). Keep explanations age-appropriate.
